jp_text: ・Primarily sold by SIers, focusing on server/infrastructure services

ually and tools like 'trend analysis tool', Maj
isemi plans and proposes 'attractive projects'

・Repeatedly hosted webinars while exploring themes that 'attract

・Improved conversion rate from 10%→20%→50% while attracting about 30 attendees each time
・Global IT company developing and selling packaged products and SaaS
・Hosting offline seminars but struggling with attendance and participation rates
・Implemented 'seminar planning that leads to business discussions'
・Infrastructure IT venture company also developing its own products
・Hosted several webinars with good attendance but not leading to business discussions
・Busy staff unable to provide sufficient sales follow-up after webinars
・Implemented 'Majifolo', a follow-up service that makes calls immediately after webinars
・Achieving attendance targets every time but not leading to business discussions
・Implemented AI-generated speech scripts and AI digital human presentation services

・Confirming the day's flow and requests

ironment
・Confirming preparation status
・Performance-based billing according to the number of attendees
・Who is the target audience (who do you want to invite to the seminar)?

or an additional seminar will be held. (The goal is to achieve this in the initial attempt)
・What is considered important as a means of lead acquisition?
・リード獲得単価、アポ獲得単価
proposed_en: Cost per lead, cost per appointment

jp_text: ・セミナー（ウェビナー）の予算の有無、及び金額
proposed_en: Whether you have a seminar (webinar) budget and the amount

jp_text: ・上記リード獲得手段の予算の割合
proposed_en: Budget allocation across the above lead acquisition channels
When budgets are formulated and decided

jp_text: ・より多くのリードを獲得したい／集客できない
proposed_en: Want to acquire more leads / struggling to attract attendees

jp_text: ・ターゲットに合ったリードを獲得したい／リードの質が悪い
proposed_en: Want better-targeted leads / current lead quality is poor

jp_text: ・ウェビナーから商談につなげたい／商談につながらない
proposed_en: Want webinars to lead to sales conversations / they currently do not

jp_text: ・ウェビナーの運営を代行してほしい／運営が大変
proposed_en: Want webinar operations handled for you / operations are burdensome

jp_text: ・まずはスモールスタートでウェビナーをやってみたい
proposed_en: Want to start small with webinars first

jp_text: ・ウェビナーを活用した、東南アジアにおける新規顧客開拓やテストマーケティング
proposed_en: Use webinars for new customer development and test marketing in Southeast Asia

jp_text: 課題について深く理解させ、
